title: Paladin Hajile
text: Requires 'Crusader Eli' + 1 LIGHT monster. Gains 300 ATK for every card your opponent controls. When this card destroys a monster by battle: Draw 1 card.

title: Sassy Rejection
text: When your opponent activates a card or effect that targets one of your monsters: Negate it, then destroy that card. Then, sass them into next week.

title: The Solitude of James
text: Once per turn: You can skip your Battle Phase. If you do, draw 2 cards. If you control no other monsters, this card cannot be destroyed by effects.

title: Ultra Instinct Eli
text: 1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters. Cannot be targeted by card effects. Once per turn (Quick Effect): Negate any attack or effect and end the Battle Phase.

title: Assimus Maximus
text: Summoned by fusing 'Bubba' with 'Da Foreigner'. Once per turn: You may taunt your opponent. If they laugh, gain 1000 LP.

title: Cardboard Joe
text: A hollow replica of a true duelist. Still manages to topdeck like a god.

title: Weegee James
text: Once per turn: You may stare menacingly at your opponent. If they flinch, banish 1 card they control.

title: Snow Bunny Mind Control
text: Target 1 opponent's monster. Take control of it until the End Phase. If it's wearing a hoodie, keep it.

title: My Oats
text: Gain 1000 LP. If used while hungry, gain an additional 1000 LP.

title: Joe Black
text: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: Add 1 'Corrupted Booster' from your deck to your hand.

title: Limitless Potential
text: Target 1 monster you control. Its ATK becomes infinite until the end of this turn. You cannot attack directly this turn.

title: Eli Soul Seal
text: Activate when a monster effect is activated: Banish the activating monster, then inflict 500 damage to your opponent.

title: Dr. Pepper
text: Equip only to a 'Joe' monster. It gains 800 ATK and cannot be put to sleep by card effects.

title: Da Foreigner
text: Once per turn: Reveal your hand. If all cards are foreign-language, draw 2 cards.

title: Bubba
text: A man of few words and powerful memes. Often seen grilling, chilling, or both.

title: 60% European
text: While on the field: This card is treated as LIGHT, DARK, EARTH, and WATER. Cannot be targeted by non-European monsters.

title: A Momment before disaster
text: Activate only when your opponent declares an attack. Destroy all monsters on the field. Then, sigh dramatically.
